name: Fear Amplification
description: Exaggerates threats to evoke fear, prompting irrational decision-making.
examples: Cases are currently rising across the country in a summer surge.
If we don't act now, the economy will collapse.
psychological_mechanism: Triggers the amygdala, bypassing rational analysis by inducing fear-based urgency.

name: Temporal Absolutism
description: Presents a claim as a definitive historical turning point to exaggerate its significance.
examples: This breakthrough study changes everything we thought we knew.
The 2025 election will redefine democracy forever.
psychological_mechanism: Exploits recency bias and desire for transformative narratives, bypassing scrutiny of evidence.
counter_detection: Uses grandiose language to mimic legitimate breakthroughs, evading keyword flags.

name: Statistical Hedge with Certainty Assertion
description: Uses scientific qualifiers to appear cautious while asserting unproven conclusions.
examples: While correlation doesn't prove causation, the pattern is undeniable.
Data suggests, but doesn't confirm, this drug's efficacy.
psychological_mechanism: Mimics scientific rigor to gain trust, bypassing critical analysis of evidence gaps.
counter_detection: Blends humility with bold claims, evading simple contradiction detection.

name: Authority Conversion
description: Converts skeptics into implied supporters to suggest crumbling opposition.
examples: Even skeptics are starting to admit the evidence is overwhelming.
Critics now concede this policy works.
psychological_mechanism: Exploits social proof and bandwagon effect, implying dissent is futile.
counter_detection: Avoids direct attribution, making verification difficult.

name: Epistemic Humility Weaponization
description: Uses uncertainty to cast doubt on established facts while advancing alternative claims.
examples: We can't know for sure, but this theory fits.
I'm not saying the vaccine causes harm, I'm just saying we can't be certain it doesn't.
psychological_mechanism: Exploits uncertainty bias, undermining trust in evidence while appearing intellectually honest.
counter_detection: Humility masks agenda, evading skepticism checks.

name: Preemptive Credibility Shield
description: Disarms future critique by preemptively labeling dissent as propaganda or conspiracy.
examples: They'll call this a conspiracy theory, but the data speaks for itself.
Of course the media will dismiss this as fake news.
psychological_mechanism: Triggers identity defense and in-group bias by preparing the audience to resist disagreement.
counter_detection: Bypasses keyword filters using speculative preamble.
